meanings.sent1: The overmeek puppy always obeyed without question.
meanings.sent2: She was so overmeek that she never spoke up for herself.
meanings.sent3: The overmeek student even apologized for things that weren't their fault.
meanings.sent4: Her overmeek nature made her an easy target for manipulation.
meanings.sent5: The overmeek kitten cowered at the slightest noise, afraid to move.

meanings.definition: to be overly meek or timid
meanings.sent1: He tends to overmeek in social situations, avoiding eye contact.
meanings.sent2: She would overmeek whenever faced with a challenge, never standing up for herself.
meanings.sent3: The cat would overmeek whenever a new person entered the room, hiding under the bed.
meanings.sent4: The flower seemed to overmeek in the shadow of the taller plants, shrinking away.
meanings.sent5: The child would overmeek whenever asked to speak in front of the class, his voice barely a whisper.
